greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between A156552 and its Moebius transform: a(n) = A156552(n) - A297112(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
mathematica: With[{s = Array[Total@ MapIndexed[#1 2^(First@ #2 - 1) &, Flatten@ Map[ConstantArray[2^(PrimePi@ #1 - 1), #2] & @@ # &, FactorInteger@ #]] - Boole[# == 1]/2 &, 91]}, Table[-DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] s[[#]] &, # < n &], {n, Length@ s}]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 13 2018 *)
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 27 2018
